Cutting Tools

  • Milling
  • Turning
  • Hole Making
  • Tooling System

Steadyline Fine boring Head

The new ranges of EPB boring heads with GL connections are designed to be used with the recently launched Steadyline GL turning and boring bars. This allows to use the same Steadyline GL bar, to realise both static internal turning (using the wide range of turning heads) & rotating boring (using these new boring heads) operations.

Specifications:

  • Hole diameter 36mm- 59mm
  • Overhang from 6xD up to 10xD
  • Tolerance can achive to IT6 (0.0025 diameter adjustment scale)

    • Benefits:

  • Excellence surface finish with single tip boring tools
  • Stable cutting process in long reaches >5xD, enabling maximum use of machine capacities
  • Increased metal removal rates, more intensive machining regimes
  • Significant reduction in machining times
  • Increase in cutting tool life
  • Reduced wear on machine components such as spindle bearings, guideways and servo drives
  • Fast ROI guaranteed !
